### UNSPSC classification:
None

### Tender type:
Competitive - Open bidding
## Contracting Office:
Natural Resources Canada
580 Booth Street
Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4
Canada
## End User:
Natural Resources Canada

## Technical requirements:
RFSO PW-23-01024547 is a request for Standing Offer for Petrographic Services to produce standard, polished, and doubly polished thin sections from rock samples submitted by the Geological Survey of Canada (GSC). The period of the Standing Offers will be for one year, with four additional one-year options. 

## Contract duration:
01 May 2023 to 30 April 2024

## Trade Agreements:
This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
